RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN FLAG sharp from the gate, quickly hooked in a duel cleared in the late going with a good effort. MR. REDLEGS battled winner to deep stretch in a determined effort but outgamed to the wire. VERNON'S BEST never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Vernon's Best
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Flag
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp from the gate, quickly hooked in a duel cleared late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & Choice OneBloodstock

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Redlegs
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled winner to deep stretch in a determined effort, outgamed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since May 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registere d Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,250). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EYE BLACK stalking behind leaders to the far turn, split horses and ridden out vigorously to the wire in a good effort. CINDY'S STORM quick to front, set pace to deep stretch, could not contain winner in the stretch run. T J MUNNINGS good position never far back throughout with no late kick in the final furlong. MIDNIGHT TEQUILA raced along evenly from inside to stretch, angled out with no late gain. ELI bobbled at the start and never a real menace throughout. BRONX pressed winner to the half with nothing left from far turn. LEMONADEATTHELATCH raced off rail to the stretch, angled in and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Black
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalking behind leaders to the far turn, split horses, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Lemonadeatthelatch
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced off rail to the stretch, angled in and never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Tequila
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from inside to stretch, angled out no gain

ENTRY.NAME: Eli
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled at the start and never a real menace thtoughout

ENTRY.NAME: T J Munnings
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back throughout with no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Bronx
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner to the half with nothing left from far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Cindy's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to front, set pace to dep stretch, could not contain winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since May 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allo wances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUT WORK'N quick to the lead, well rated throughout, to hold sway to wire. GULLANE good position never far back to the turn, rallied while coming on. MY GRASS IS BLUE raced along evenly for the show spot with no late kick. FUTURE VICTORY no speed to the turn, improved position no real threat. DAWN WEST unhurried early, improved position into far turn, leveled off. DROP ANCHOR chased winner to the half, gave way readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Out Work'n
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the lead, well rated throughout, to hold sway to wire

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jayne Doi Johnson, Jeanne Doi & Robert E. Hibbert

ENTRY.NAME: Drop Anchor
ENTRY.OWNER: Cox Christopher J and Adams Janey
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the half, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Gullane
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back to the turn, rallied while coming on

ENTRY.NAME: Future Victory
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara Ouzts Toni and Mattingly David H
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, improved position no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Dawn West
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, improved position into far turn, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: My Grass Is Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly for the show spot with no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 16 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUIERO MAS just off leader to the half, took over far turn, drew clear late. MIDNIGHTMAKESSENSE stalking just off leaders to the turn, rallied for place no match. WASSER raced off rail throughout while coming on the show spot. SPRING MAGIC four wide first turn, continued on with no late gain in stretch. DOOIT sent up for the lead, stayed to the half and faded back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Dooit
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent up for the lead, stayed to the half and faded back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Quiero Mas
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader to the half, took over far turn, drew clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Wasser
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced off rail throughout while coming on the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Midnightmakessense
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalking just off leaders to the turn, rallied for place no match

ENTRY.NAME: Spring Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: four wide first turn, continued on with no late gain in stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 16, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Prefer red).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAVY CROSS settled in on the lead quickly, well rationed throughout under good handling and went well clear in the final furlong. ELIZA'S HONOR tariled while never far back to far turn, wide run for place spot. WEAPON tried to stay with winner to no avail and faded back stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Eliza's Honor
ENTRY.COMMENT: tariled while never far back to far turn, wide run for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Navy Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in on the lead quickly, well rationed throughout, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Weapon
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to stay with winner to no avail and faded back stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 18400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since May 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Any Maiden Races, A nd Only Claiming Races And Only Starter Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALLMEMARTHAJANE pressured on the lead to the half, headed in the stretch, roused and edged clear in a solid effort. QUICKY DESIRE pressured winner throughout, stuck a head in front in the late stretch but outgamed to the wire. COMMANDANDCONTROL chased top pair to the stretch, proved no match while evenly in the stretch run. BELLE OF ST. JOHN raced off rail throughout with no late response in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Callmemarthajane
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured on the lead to the half, headed stretch, pulled clear

ENTRY.NAME: Commandandcontrol
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the stretch, proved no match while evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Belle of St. John
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced off rail throughout with no late response in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Quicky Desire
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured winner throughout, stuck a head in front, outgamed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 16 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOTO'SRUBYSLIPPERS tracked leader to the turn, headed that one, drew off stretch run. LONG BLACK VEIL trailed to the turn, rallied strongly in the stretch closed gap. TABOO HOO good position from inside throughout with no late kick in stretch. LANALIKESCHOOCHOOS speed to the fron from inside, headed quarter pole, stopped. SWEET BABY RAY awkwardly from the gate, never menaced throughout. SCAPITURE broke sharp, dropped back quickly, always trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Lanalikeschoochoos
ENTRY.OWNER: Flower City Racing LLC and Meyer Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the fron from inside, headed quarter pole, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Scapiture
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, dropped back quickly, always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Taboo Hoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position from inside throughout with no late kick in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Baby Ray
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkwardly from the gate, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Long Black Veil
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the turn, rallied strongly in the stretch closed gap

ENTRY.NAME: Toto'srubyslippers
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader to the turn, headed that one, drew off stretch run

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: David M. Clay & Deborah G. Clay

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5F Turf CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OPTIMIZME good position from off rail to the turn, rallied outside in time while ridden out. WITCHING HOUR inside trip to the stretch, ran on well split horses in the stretch and led but nailed at the wire in a good effort. SHEZADADDYSGIRL chased leader to turn, took over into stretch, wore down late. AWESOME VALOR inside run to turn in good position, dug in gamely, faltered. DOGWOODS BECCA shuffled start, ran into a bit of traffic in stretch, mildly. VIVI BRASS saved ground to the turn to no avail. BIRD SET FREE never a menace throughout. SHADY DAISY never a factor. MARLAND broke well and failed to threaten. HER TIME IS NOW rushed with inside brief speed to the turn and began to bear out into the turn while fading.

ENTRY.NAME: Dogwoods Becca
ENTRY.OWNER: Scott Anthony L Scott Chris L and Scott Mindy
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled start, ran into a bit of traffic in stretch mildly late

ENTRY.NAME: Vivi Brass
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the turn to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Witching Hour
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to the stretch, ran on well split horses, led, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to turn in good position angled out stretch, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Her Time Is Now
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start, rushed inside, began to bear out into the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Shady Daisy
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Tribbett Robert L and Bechtel Glenn
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Bird Set Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a menace throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Optimizme
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position from off rail to the turn, rallied outside in time

ENTRY.NAME: Marland
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well and failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Shezadaddysgirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to turn, took over into stretch, wore down late
